questions.question: What is the capital of France?
Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
What is the world's largest ocean?
Which is the longest river in the world?
What is the tallest mountain in the world?
What is the largest desert in the world?
Who was the first president of the United States?
When did World War II end?
What year did Christopher Columbus discover America?
Who wrote 'Romeo and Juliet'?
Which civilization built the Machu Picchu?
Which year did the Berlin Wall fall?
What is the chemical symbol for water?
What is the largest organ in the human body?
What is the closest planet to the Sun?
What is the process by which plants make their own food called?
What is the unit of measurement for force?
What is the study of earthquakes called?
Who wrote 'To Kill a Mockingbird'?
What is the name of the hobbit in 'The Lord of the Rings'?
Who wrote 'Pride and Prejudice'?
What is the name of Sherlock Holmes' companion?
What is the famous line from Shakespeare's 'Hamlet'?
options: To be or not to be, that is the question
Romeo, Romeo! Wherefore art thou Romeo?
To thine own self be true
questions.correctAnswer: To be or not to be, that is the question

questions.question: What is the name of the monster in 'Frankenstein'?
Which sport is played at Wimbledon?
Who is known as 'The Greatest' in boxing?
In which country did the sport of judo originate?
What is the term for a perfect score in bowling?
Which country has won the most FIFA World Cup titles?
What is the distance of a marathon race in kilometers?
Who is the CEO of Tesla Motors?
What does CPU stand for?
Which company developed the Android operating system?
What is the programming language used to build Android apps?
What is the name of the first web browser?
What does URL stand for?

news.title: ant design part 0
news.description: Ant Design, a design language for background applications, is refined by Ant UED Team.
news.content: We supply a series of design principles, practical patterns and high quality design resources (Sketch and Axure), to help people create their product prototypes beautifully and efficiently.
